name: ChemTex
description: Renders chemical structures and formulas. Supports mhchem, chemfig, SMILES, and molecule names. Client-side rendering with SmilesDrawer.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; default-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' http://localhost:* http://192.168.1.4:* ws://localhost:* https://www.ebi.ac.uk https://*.ebi.ac.uk https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov https://3Dmol.org https://www.crystallography.net https://files.rcsb.org https://cdn.rcsb.org; frame-src http://localhost:* https://embed.molview.org https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov
